mapper.select: SELECT '双色球' AS name, 'TWO_COLOR_BALL' AS en_name, issue_number, award_date, ROUND(bonus_pool * POW(10, -8), 2) as bonus_pool, CONCAT(red1, ',', red2, ',', red3, ',', red4, ',', red5, ',', red6) AS red_balls, blue1 AS blue_balls, first_prize_number, first_prize_amount, second_prize_number, second_prize_amount FROM two_color_ball WHERE issue_number < #{minIssueNumber} ORDER BY issue_number DESC LIMIT #{pageSize}
